item.title: Drafting Batters in Fantasy Baseball, Part 2
item.description:
So where are we now? Other Considerations: Positions for Feast or Famine But were they, though? Up Next
So where are we now? If youâ€™re reading about my fantasy baseball experience for the first time, welcome! You may be better oriented by reading this first. In the previous post, I wrote about my draft strategy using WAR, and how I selected Posey, a catcher, in the second round, and Simmons, a shortstop, in the fourth round.
